title: How to know if this right now is not a dream? How do you tell if what you are experiencing isn't just another dream - Quora

response.answer_text: The most defining factor other than that it looks more real and has an amplitude more sensations is that you cannot die in a dream but you can in real life. This is why it could be dangerous to think that life is just another dream too religiously. Our fears of death are a very powerful protection mechanism for survival.

If you can't differenciate dreams from reality, you may need a therapist or sleep study. To most people, it might take a minute for a vivid dream to wear off, but soon, it will be certain in most peoples’ minds. Best of luck.
